name: POSPOS - โปรแกรมขายหน้าร้าน
description: POSPOS       POSPOS         - - - -  -Gen   -  -  - TAX, -  POSPOS is an application for managing storefront. That has the function to cover the whole store And behind the shop to help facilitate your business to finish in one place  POSPOS users will be able to experience product sales, stock management, and more. Sales summary That is easy, convenient, and fast. It helps manage your business more easily with the following features  - Selling products at the store - Issue a receipt - Setting up shop information systems - manage stock -Gen Code and Barcode - Calculate the stores income and expenses - Collect customer and supplier data -Document management TAX, purchase order - Sales report summary
